meanings.definition: Not able to be satisfied or quenched
meanings.sent1: The unslakable thirst of the desert traveler could not be eased by a small sip of water.
meanings.sent2: Her unslakable curiosity led her to ask endless questions about the world around her.
meanings.sent3: The unslakable hunger of the cookie monster made him devour the entire batch in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: His unslakable desire for knowledge drove him to read every book in the library.
meanings.sent5: The unslakable flames of the fire engulfed the entire forest in a blazing inferno.

meanings.definition: Unable to be appeased or relieved
meanings.sent1: The unslakable anger of the toddler could not be calmed by any toy or treat.
meanings.sent2: The unslakable pain in her heart lingered long after the breakup.
meanings.sent3: The unslakable itch on his back made him squirm and wiggle in his seat.
meanings.sent4: Her unslakable fear of spiders caused her to scream at the sight of a tiny arachnid.
meanings.sent5: The unslakable sorrow in his eyes spoke volumes about his loss.
